paragraphs.zh-tw: （音樂）（音樂）羅比米松 (Robbie Mizzone)：謝謝大家。湯米米松 (Tommy Mizzone)：非常感謝。
paragraphs.en: (Music) (Music) (Music ends) Robbie Mizzone: Thank you. Tommy Mizzone: Thank you very much.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 我們很高興能來到這裡，這真是莫大的榮幸。像他說的，我們三個來自新澤西——你知道所謂世界蘭草音樂之鄉。
paragraphs.en: We're so excited to be here.It's such an honor. Like he said, we'rethree brothers from New Jersey -- you know, the bluegrasscapital of the world.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 多年前我們接觸了蘭草音樂，便從此愛上了它，希望大家也會喜歡。
paragraphs.en: We discovered bluegrass a few years ago, and we fell in love with it. We hope you guys will too.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 下面我們將表演一首原創作品《時光飛逝》，相信它會是歌如其名。（調音）（音樂）湯米米松：非常感謝。
paragraphs.en: This next song is an originalwe wrote called "Time Lapse," and it will probably live up to its name. (Tuning) (Music) (Music ends) TM: Thank you very much.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 羅比米松：讓我來簡單介紹一下我們的樂隊。吉他手是我十五歲的哥哥湯米。
paragraphs.en: RM: I'm just going to takea second to introduce the band. On guitar is my 15-year-old brother Tommy.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 彈班卓琴的是十歲的強尼。他也是我的兄弟。
paragraphs.en: On banjo is 10-year-old Jonny. He's also our brother.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 我是羅比，今年十四歲，我是小提琴手。如你所見，我們想給自己出個難題，所以選擇
paragraphs.en: And I'm Robbie, and I'm 14,and I play the fiddle. As you can see, we decidedto make it hard on ourselves, and we chose to play three songs in three different keys.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 彈三首不同音調的曲子。是的。我也要解釋一下，許多人很好奇我們為何取名「沉睡的班卓男孩」。這要追溯到強尼小時候，他剛開始練班卓琴時會躺著彈並且閉上眼睛，我們說看起來好像他在睡覺。
paragraphs.en: (Tuning) Yeah. I'm also going to explain,a lot of people want to know where we got the name"Sleepy Man Banjo Boys" from. So, it started when Jonny was little, and he first started the banjo,he would play on his back with his eyes closed, and we'd say it lookedlike he was sleeping.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 其他的你們就自己琢磨吧。湯米米松：我們也不清楚是什麽原因，
paragraphs.en: So you can probably piecethe rest together. TM: We can't really figure out the reason.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 可能是因為琴太重了。（音樂）（音樂）湯米米松：非常感謝。
paragraphs.en: It might have beenthat it weighs about a million pounds. (Music) (Music) (Music ends) TM: Thank you very much.

title: Sleepy Man Banjo Boys Bluegrass Virtuosity From New Jersey
